name: Warehouse (Yozoraki)
description:
A short puzzle game where you simply have to control robots to get a box from one side of the warehouse to the other. The only problem is that the robots create hazards when not in your control. 11 hand-made levels!

Completed in 48 hours for the GMTK2020 Game Jam.

Apologies for no audio, sacrifices were made.
